summary: Wanting to earn fame and fortune, a small time lawyer files a PIL for an infamous hit-and-run, and thus learns what it really is like to be a lawyer.
cast: Arshad Warsi|Amrita Rao|Boman Irani|Saurabh Shukla|Harsh Chhaya|Mohan Kapur|Mohan Agashe|Ramesh Deo|Sanjay Mishra|Rajeev Siddhartha|Vibha Chhibber|Kartick Sitaraman|Kannan Arunachalam|Manoj Bakshi|Mukund Bhatt|Sandeep Bose|Rajesh Gandhi|Vijay Gupta|Brijendra Kala|Sachin Kathuria|Ishtiyak Khan|Veena Malji|Jogi Mallang|Hemant Mishra|Satyadeep Misra|Deepak Mistry|Manoj Pahwa|Sushil Pandey|Vishal Om Prakash|Surendra Rajan|Aneel Rana|Manoj Rathod|Amarjeet Shah|Navmeet Singh|Sonel Singh|Datta Sonawane|Hardik Thakkar|Sushil Tyagi|Tariq Vasudeva|Arun Verma
title: Jolly LLB
